attributes.action: STOP BIASED MEDIA COVERAGE OF MIGRANT CRISIS
attributes.additional_details: it is biased reporting to show Police/Military personnel in Macedonia beating migrants with sticks, or Police in Greece using batons on migrants, but refuse to show migrants rioting, burning vehicles and destroying the towns and cities that took them in.
attributes.background: The British Media coverage of the migrant crisis is biased In a deliberate attempt to influence Public Opinion. The media have their focus on the highly emotive aspects of this humanitarian crisis. Whilst refusing to report on the migrants rioting in Greece, Italy, Spain and Sweden.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament do not control the media.
